WorkItem.Description:
A custom SecurityTokenCache is needed to leverage WIF's IsSessionMode feature in a web-farm environment.  Several Microsoft employees have either implemented or described implementing such a cache however no samples can be found on the web other than the small snippets that appear in Hervey Wilson's PDC 2009 session.
 
Please share Hervey's TableSecurityTokenCache or something similar.
 
This request appears in the following forums:
 
http://stackoverflow.com/questions/8015542/azure-web-farm-ready-securitytokencache
http://social.msdn.microsoft.com/Forums/en-US/Geneva/thread/a74117a8-2981-498e-8d2f-b95cd55a0e46
http://social.msdn.microsoft.com/Forums/en-US/windowsazuresecurity/thread/5017a7ba-3526-48ab-b6cc-992068d0770a
http://identityserver.codeplex.com/discussions/278492
 
Thanks!
 
jd
